name: svelte-typewriter
description: A simple and reusable typewriter effect for your Svelte applications
author: Henrique Borges <henriqueborgeshbr@gmail.com>

scripts.prerelease: docker rmi -f release && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --build-arg HOST_USER_UID="$(id -u)" -t release .
scripts.release: docker run --rm -t -v $PWD:/repo -e GIT_NAME="$(git config user.name)" -e GIT_EMAIL="$(git config user.email)" release ./bump-package-json
